alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 7:17PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mitchell County through 800 PM CDT... At 717 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glen Elder, or 11 miles west of Beloit, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Mitchell County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
